summary: Adds an MCM menu with options to control the weather and set weather related options.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#9999cc][size=6]- Weather Control Center -[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Description[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]This mod adds an MCM menu that lets you configure and set the current weather and lets you modify different weather options. It also lets you make custom lists of different weather to quickly cycle through.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Background[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Looking up weather codes and typing in console can be annoying and inefficient. So I made this mod to fix that.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/]SkyUI[/url] and [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Mod Support[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Supports Vanilla, Dawnguard, Dragonborn, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/]Climates of Tamriel[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1875/]RCRN[/url] weathers. Plus all mods that replaces/changes/patches any of the weathers added by these mods/dlcs.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Note[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Mods that add new weather have to be above 0x80 in your load order (closer to the masters files) for the Status page to display correctly.
Modifying game settings might cause some minor issues depending on the weather. So far I haven't noticed anything with CoT installed.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Current State[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Finished.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Future State[/size][/color]
[size=2]Unknown.[/size]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Install[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Use your favorite manager, or extract to Skyrim/Data.[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Updates
[/size][/color][size=2]-v1.61 Fixed broken update message[/size]
[size=1]-v1.60 Filtering and renaming of lists.[/size]
[size=1]-v1.50 More options for managing lists.[/size]
[color=#ffffff][size=1]- v1.40 Added RCRN weathers[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=1]- v1.30 Added DLC weathers
- v1.20 Added option highlighting
- v1.10 More descriptive headers; Added warning message for gamesetting ; Some small changes
- v1.01 Fixed menu loading problem; Removed "Don't Remove" button ;P ; Plus small polishes to the menu
- v1.00 Initial Release[/size][/color]

[color=#99ccff][size=4]Tools Used[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]- Creation Kit; to make the plugin
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url]; to find weather codes
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/]Automation Tools[/url]; to extract weather codes
- [url=http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/]IntelliJ[/url]; to write code for formatting output from AT
- [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]Notepad++[/url]; for scripting
-Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57308/]SkyUILib[/url]; for text input boxes
[/size][/color]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Thank You
[/size][/color]..to Climates of Tamriel and RCRN for making awesome new weather.[/center]
author: NoxMentis
